item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi! My name is Kirill Gadjello and I’ve worked in various companies, large and small, some of which are better known for their image search. While I’m proud of my professional accomplishments, I find it especially joyous to explore novel areas in a self-directed fashion. I’m interested in collborating on cool public and private projects, don’t hesitate to reach out to me! Email: kirill.gadjello@protonmail.com GitHub: https://github.com/kir-gadjello HN: kir-gadjello Telegram: @reactiveloop
